text:
e="preserve">Terrence Owen Buckle (24 August 1940 – 10 September 2020) was a Canadian Anglican bishop. He was Archbishop of Yukon from 1995 to 2010 and Metropolitan of British Columbia and Yukon from 2005 until 2010, in the Anglican Church of Canada. He was born in Ontario.
Buckle died on 10 September 2020 in Whitehorse, Yukon from cancer at the age of 80.

annotations.surface_form: Metropolitan of British Columbia and Yukon
